title: Prime Villas - Dehiwala
location: Sri Somarathne Mawatha, Dehiwala, Bellanthota Junction. , Dehiwala
details:
Prime Paragon Bellanwila is a new project just launched by Prime Group to match the higher standard of individual houses , that always has the attractions among sri lankas, consists of 12 luxury 4 Bedroom houses ,located in a centralize area which connects colombo and suburbs like Nigegoda , Dehiwala, Mountlavinia , Borelasgamuwa , Maharagama , and Piliyandala within minutes.

Please book your dream home before it grabbed.
